ygData.subject: RE: Lullaby interrupting casters
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The problem for me is being stunned. I ll mash my NumLock key to start running, switch to my hotkey bank that holds my meelee and inv slots and start
ygData.messageBody:
> The key to outrunning spellcasters is to equip
> your drum. With your drum they should be able
> to tag you with one spell. Without it they can
> get off two or three.

The problem for me is being stunned. I'll mash my NumLock key to start
running, switch to my hotkey bank that holds my meelee and inv slots and
start swapping, all the sudden I'm not running anymore and/or my Selo's has
been ended. Now I have either stand still and finish swapping weapon &
shield for an instrument or I have to mash the NumLock again, switch back to
my songs hotkey bank, hit Selo's (several times lately before it works),
switch back to my slots bank, finish swapping items and hope I'm still alive
in the time that it took to do the above. If I'm having an especially bad
day, I simply can't keep Selo's going and myself moving because I'm being
nailed by spells that stun me and turn off my songs. Those are usually the
days that I can't get very far before being stunned, so another lovely mob
gets close enough to me that as soon as I'm unstunned, they bash me and I'm
stunned again.

*sigh*
